vendor_name: Paradox Singapore Merchant Court at Clarke Quay
title: Extended by Popular Demand: Singapore Riverside Retreat in Clarke Quay with Daily Breakfast & Cocktails
description:
Experience Singapore's old-world charm alongside the city's glamour at this urban resort in Clarke Quay. The ultimate base for exploring everything the Garden City has to offer, this sophisticated property offers heritage features and contemporary comforts in equal measure.

Perched along the riverbank, Ellenborough Market Cafe serves up time-honoured Peranakan classics and international flavours, while Blue Potato invites you to indulge in Western favourites by the outdoor pool. Strategically located by the Singapore River, Crossroads Bar invites with grand floor-to-ceiling windows, a sophisticated ambiance and well-crafted drinks.

Although only steps from Singapore's bustling bars, eateries and nightlife, this resort is still blissfully serene. Retreat to Aramsa Spa for rejuvenating treatments with natural, botanical and herb-based products, creating exclusive treatments and experiences with balance in mind.
location_description: Paradox Singapore Merchant Court at Clarke Quay

title: Glamorous Sofitel City Escape with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Dinners
description: The very best of Singapore is at your feet from the stylish SO Sofitel Singapore, ideally located in the heart of the city’s central business district. Experience the culture and electric atmosphere of this sprawling metropolis in pure Sofitel style while enjoying daily breakfast, nightly dinners and a drink on arrival.

title: Enjoy Daily Breakfasts & Daily Lunches Or Dinners
description: Have the best of Singapore right on your doorstep with a three-night getaway at the uber-stylish SO Sofitel Singapore - close to Marina Bay and Gardens by the Bay. Plus receive daily breakfast, your choice of daily lunches or nightly dinners and a welcome drink each for two adults.

title: Pan Pacific Singapore Architectural Opulence near Orchard Road with Club Lounge Access & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Be among the first to discover this sanctuary filled with lush flora, spread across four uniquely designed levels towering over Singapore's iconic Orchard Road. Boasting spaces inspired by nature - Forest, Beach, Garden and Cloud - this architectural gem is one for the bucket list. When the sun is shining, take to the glittering emerald pool on the unique Beach Terrace, where coast meets sky and palm groves seemingly float above the busy pavement.

Explore Orchard Road's renowned high-end shopping, eating and drinking district on your doorstep, or stroll to Singapore Botanic Gardens, a UNESCO World Heritage Site that provides a leafy refuge from the cosmopolitan atmosphere.

Back at the hotel, visit Florette, a trendy bar where bubbles and caviar unite against a smouldering backdrop, or discover farm-to-table fare served in a gilded setting at Mosella. Indulge in all the spoils of Pan Pacific Orchard, from impeccable modern design to its elite location and sparkling views of Singapore.

title: Grand Opening: Stay at Singapore’s Newest Luxury Hotel
description: The Capitol Kempinski Hotel Singapore is the most anticipated brand-new, five-star property opening in Asia. Run by the iconic German Kempinski Hotels group, one of the world’s oldest and most prestigious brands, it places guests in the heart of the city’s cultural district and near top attractions such as the Marina Bay area, Gardens by the Bay and Chinatown. Perfect for a stopover or a luxe city break, your escape includes an incredible daily bottomless breakfast with free-flow sparkling wine, one three-course dinner for two, one daily cocktail each, a spa discount and more.
location_description: The Capitol Kempinski Hotel Singapore - January 2019

title: Singapore Sophistication in Luxurious Robertson Quay with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Centred around one of Singapore's most trending hubs, an elegant retreat awaits at this newly opened colonial-inspired Robertson Quay gem. Just steps from the flowing Singapore River, this heritage-rich property boasts an enviable location, just moments from the city's best dining and entertainment precincts. Savour the flavours of Singapore's culinary heritage at the hotel's onsite restaurant Entrepôt, or try a bespoke boozy concoction in the warmth of Chandu; a charming hidden bar with a unique market-to-glass approach. Between city-slicking adventures, float your cares away in the hotel's spacious pool before diving into a tasty snack and the perfect gin and tonic served at the alfresco poolside bar.

Anchored in this fantastic location, there are endless exploration possibilities. Take a stroll through the waterfront neighbourhood of Robertson Quay where the foreshore is dotted with acclaimed dining and rich with culture. Venture further upstream to the nearby Clarke Quay to satisfy your high-end shopping cravings, while immersing yourself in the city's renowned nightlife and trendy bar scene. Re-energise with a session in the hotel's fully equipped gym, or with a book on a comfortable sun lounger overlooking the glimmering pool.
location_description: The Robertson House by The Crest Collection

title: It's Back: Best-Selling, Award-Winning Elegance Overlooking Marina Bay
description: Stay in a prime location near Marina Bay at Conrad Centennial Singapore, a newly-refurbished, luxury oasis in the city. You’ll enjoy access to the exclusive Executive Lounge where you'll indulge in daily buffet breakfast with sparkling wine, afternoon tea, nightly cocktails and canapes and all-day wine, beer and drinks alongside breathtaking Singapore city views. Plus, enjoy your choice of either a five-course feast at the highly-acclaimed Golden Peony or a luxury seafood buffet at Oscar’s on one night of your stay, and a 20% discount on additional dining and drinks at the hotel.

title: Extended by Popular Demand: Heritage Kempinski Luxury Suites in the Heart of Singapore with Daily Breakfast & Lounge Access
description:
Experience unrivalled luxury at The Capitol Kempinski Hotel Singapore, a five-star property that exudes the charm and character of a luxurious colonial building while offering every modern convenience. This exclusive suite-only retreat is perfectly positioned to explore Singapore's famed sites, including Marina Bay Sands, Merlion Park and the National Museum of Singapore, as well as the city's vibrant dining and shopping scenes.

Head to the hotel's saltwater relaxation pool to soak away your stress or work up a sweat in the onsite fitness centre. Pop over to the mouthwatering 15 Stamford restaurant for tasty bites from the restaurant’s coal grill or visit one of the four eateries at Arcade @ The Capitol Kempinski for delicious international cuisine.

title: Refined Singapore Luxury with Regent Club Lounge Access
description:
Experience the sophisticated elegance and refined luxury of Regent Singapore, named among the top 10 hotels in Singapore at the Condé Nast Traveler Readers’ Choice Awards 2019. This incredible property, located a mere 800m from the start of iconic Orchard Road, is an exercise in five-star opulence and sophisticated style.

Your package includes one award-winning signature cocktail per person at the seductively-lit Manhattan bar - crowned number two of Asia’s Top 50 Bars and number 11 in the world. Your stay also includes daily buffet breakfast and access to the Regent Club Lounge with daily afternoon tea, nightly free-flow drinks and hors d’oeuvres from 5:30pm to 8pm.

Plus, travel freely with absolutely zero surcharges for any room type - and up to two kids (aged 11 years and under) stay free with daily buffet breakfast and Regent Club Lounge access.

**Travelling with a larger family? Upgrade to a Family Suite package**, valid for two adults and up to three kids (aged 11 years and under) OR four adults total, with daily breakfast, Regent Club Lounge access and a semi-buffet dining experience at Basilico for all guests.

title: Newly Renovated Singapore Glamour near Chinatown with Club Lounge Access & Nightly Free-Flow Cocktails
description:
Discover a new world of luxury at this five-star Singapore stay, set magnificently among the traditional shophouses, soaring skyscrapers, trendy cocktail bars and pedestrian-only laneways of the ultra-cool Tanjong Pagar district.

Inspired by the city’s glamorous past, blossoming in tandem with Tanjong Pagar’s rapid evolution, every handcrafted detail of Amara Singapore has been finetuned to perfection. Rejuvenate at HAACH Spa, where natural, botanical treatments restore balance and calm; keep up your routine at the state-of-the-art fitness centre or plunge into the refreshing outdoor pool.

There's plenty to delight across the hotel's restaurants and bars: sip on a perfectly crafted cocktail at Jigger & Pony, considered one of the world's best, or enjoy local flavours at Cafe Oriental. Discover what happens when yakitori meets omakase at Sapoto, or venture to the cool climes of Alsace at Bar-Roque Grill.

Just steps from the Tanjong Pagar MRT station, Amara Singapore offers the perfect base for exploring Singapore’s best. Whether it’s temples and tipples in Chinatown, Michelin-starred chicken rice at the Maxwell Hawker Centre or the iconic Gardens by the Bay, there's plenty to keep you entertained within close reach.

vendor_name: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach
title: JW Marriott's Newest Five-Star Singapore Hotel
description: Experience Singapore’s newest designer hotel - the five-star JW Marriott Singapore South Beach, located near Marina Bay and Suntec Mall. Spend three nights of VIP Executive Lounge luxury including four hours of unlimited nightly cocktails, hot buffet breakfasts, afternoon tea, evening hors d’oeuvres, daily refreshments, two welcome cocktails and more. No seasonal surcharges. Only $999 for two adults, valued up to $2,859.
location_description: JW Marriott Hotel Singapore South Beach [201588] Grand Opening Year Exclusive at JW Marriott Singapore

title: Award-Winning Heritage Kempinski Luxury in the Heart of Singapore with Daily Breakfast & Dining Credit
description:
Discover unparalleled luxury at this centrally located Singaporean retreat, a five-star Kempinski property that blends the charm and character of a heritage building with all the modern conveniences. 

Ideally situated for exploring Singapore's iconic attractions, including Marina Bay Sands, Merlion Park and the National Museum of Singapore, this exclusive haven also offers easy access to the city's vibrant dining and shopping scenes.

Relax and unwind in the hotel's saltwater pool, or stay active in the state-of-the-art fitness centre. Savour delectable dishes from the coal grill at the acclaimed 15 Stamford restaurant, enjoy a wide selection of rum and cocktails at The Bar at 15 Stamford or treat yourself to a luxurious Sunday brunch or an elegant afternoon tea at the Lobby Lounge.

title: Grand Mercure Singapore Retreat within Heritage Katong with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Free-Flow Drinks & Club Lounge Access
description:
Step into the heart of Singapore’s vibrant Katong district at this contemporary retreat, the perfect home base with the best of the city right at your doorstep. With the colourful Peranakan houses mere steps away and easy access to the MRT railway, you're perfectly positioned to explore iconic sights and local treasures while staying in absolute comfort.

Boasting spacious rooms and an array of dining options, from casual cafes to dim sum, this modern abode is ready to welcome the whole family. Kids will love exploring the nearby East Coast Beach and cooling off in the outdoor pool, while parents can sit poolside and sip on a refreshing cocktail from Breez Bar.

After a day of urban adventure, the exclusive Breez Bar serves up light snacks and two hours of free-flow drinks - the perfect time for an appetiser before indulging in an authentic meal at Jia Wei Chinese Restaurant or heading out to see the city come alive at night.
offer_address: 50 East Coast Road, Roxy Square, Singapore 428769, Singapore

title: Singapore Award-Winning 19th-Century Boutique Elegance with Daily Breakfast, Cocktails & Dining Credit
description:
Enter a world of unsurpassed elegance and charm at Duxton Reserve, Autograph Collection - an award-winning boutique retreat rich in both history and opulence.

Once a row of heritage shophouses, Duxton Reserve, Autograph Collection's 19th-century framework has been transformed into a striking hotel thanks to acclaimed British designer - and former Bond girl - Anouska Hempel, who effortlessly captures her Far East wanderlust through eclectic designs: from theatrical gold fans and layers of oriental screens to intricate calligraphy wallpaper from Anouska's personal collection. The Asian flare flows through to Yellow Pot restaurant where clean Chinese cuisine takes centre stage. Feast on a flawless menu of sustainably sourced delights with a menu helmed by award-winning Executive Chef, Sebastian Goh, then stroll into the adjoining Anouska's Bar for a Bond-inspired cocktail.

Find yourself in the historic hub of Singapore when you stay at Duxton Reserve, Autograph Collection. Surrounded by exceptional restaurants, overflowing bars and an acclaimed street food scene, Tanjong Pagar is the epicentre for socialising, dining and nightlife. Take a short stroll to culture-rich Chinatown for a storied insight into its enchanting temples or hop on the MRT and explore Gardens by the Bay, the Botanical Gardens and beyond.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Start each day with a delicious à la carte breakfast at Yellow Pot restaurant
- Celebrate with a daily cocktail at the glamorous Anouska's Bar
- Dine in style with SG100 drink and dining credit per stay to enjoy across the hotel's bars and restaurants
- Explore Singapore until the very last moment with 3pm late checkout (subject to availability)

**Longer stay bonus:** Stay three nights or more in any room and enjoy a one-time, five-course set-menu dinner at Yellow Pot. Begin with fried prawns dressed in bonito aioli and almond flakes and hot and sour soup, followed by steamed barramundi with scallion-ginger pesto and jalapeño chicken stir fry. Complete your meal with the dessert of the day. Vegetarian option available.

**Upgrade bonus:** Choose an Opium or Duplex suite and receive a fabulous one-time afternoon tea with a glass of Cava.

**Book with 100% Confidence:** If for whatever reason you don’t want to go on your holiday, you can cancel right up to 14 days before check-in and get a 100% credit to use at Luxury Escapes for any other accommodation offer. Excludes flights, see the Fine Print for details.

title: Ultimate Singapore City Glamour with Rooftop Pool, Daily Breakfast & Two-Hour Free-Flow Cocktails
description:
Discover a new world of luxury at this Singapore stay, set magnificently among the traditional shophouses, cocktail bars and pedestrian-only laneways of ultra-cool Duxton Hill. Inspired by the city’s glamorous past and fearlessly embracing its future, each handcrafted detail of this stay has been fine-tuned to perfection.

The hotel is home to 10 onsite restaurants and bars, including the spectacular 1970s-themed rooftop pool zone, Canyon Club, with some of the city’s best skyline views. Culinary legend Dario Cecchini - dubbed ‘The Greatest Butcher in the World’ by The New York Times - leads the garden-fringed trattoria, Bottega Di Carna. For guaranteed good times, begin each morning with artisanal coffee at Christina’s and kick off every evening at Singapore-inspired tiki joint Jungle Ballroom.

Mondrian Singapore Duxton offers the perfect base for exploring Singapore’s best. Whether it’s temples and tipples in Chinatown or Michelin-starred chicken rice at the Maxwell Hawker Centre, both are within easy walking distance, and the iconic Gardens by the Bay reserve is an easy taxi ride away.

description:

title: Five-Star Singapore Hotel with Executive Lounge Access
description: Discover the heartbeat of Singapore with a four day/three night weekend stay at the five-star, award-winning Singapore Marriott Tang Plaza Hotel, centrally located on the famous Orchard Road. Luxuriate in unrivalled comfort in a Deluxe Room and enjoy daily breakfasts, executive lounge access including privileges such as evening cocktails and hors d'oeuvres, plus a three-course dinner at the hotel’s Pool Grill for two adults.

title: Brand-New Five-Star Singapore CBD Apartment-Style Stay with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Free-Flow Drinks Hour
description:
Between historic hawker centres, spectacular skylines and iconic supertrees stands the brand-new, five-star Dao by Dorsett AMTD Singapore, offering guests an apartment-style stay in the heart of the city’s vibrant central business district. Positioned just moments from MRT Tanjong Pagar Station and the city's many delights - including world-renowned culinary paradise Lau Pa Sat and the gravity-defying Marina Bay Sands complex - each spacious, contemporary apartment boasts everything you need to discover Singapore's very best.

After days spent shopping on Orchard Road or witnessing the wondrous at Gardens by the Bay, return to a top-notch fitness centre and moments by the hotel's serene, seventh-floor infinity pool, seemingly disappearing into the skyline beyond. Two sumptuous dining venues await at Dao by Dorsett AMTD Singapore - savour international plates with a Singaporean flair at Collective or sip handcrafted cocktails beneath avant-garde chandeliers in the hotel’s Grand Lobby. The hotel’s commitment to bespoke luxury extends to its extravagant Plant Library, the perfect place to meet a quiet green companion for the ultimate personalised escape.
offer_address: 6 Shenton Way, OUE Downtown 1, 07-01 Singapore 068809, Singapore

title: Sofitel Singapore City Centre: Luxury Experience with Club Privileges
description: Experience the food, culture and electric atmosphere of Singapore with a five-star stay including VIP club privileges at the recently opened Sofitel Singapore City Centre, located above an MRT train station connecting guests to Singapore's many attractions. Includes daily breakfast, all-day refreshments and afternoon snacks, nightly cocktails, wines and spirits, nightly canapés and more.
offer_address: 9 Wallich Street, Singapore 078885 (Enter via Peck Seah Street)

title: Five-Star Singapore Heritage Glamour with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Free-Flow Drinks Hour
description:
Discover old-world opulence in the Lion City with a five-star heritage stay at the newly-restored Hotel Telegraph Singapore. Born out of the city’s historic telecommunications building, this hotel - a member of the prestigious Small Luxury Hotels of the World collection - features bespoke rooms, each showcasing soaring neoclassical architecture, breathtaking Parisian flourishes and faultless service. Savour morning coffee and midnight cocktails at Lobby Bar, reimagined Singaporean plates at The Dining Room or head to 1927 Rooftop Bar for signature drinks backed by panoramic views over the city’s spellbinding skyline.

When you’re ready to explore, Hotel Telegraph Singapore offers the perfect base. Head to nearby Lau Pa Sat market, a landmark institution blending urban history, colonial architecture and mouthwatering eats, shop your way through Orchard Road or say hello to the iconic Gardens by the Bay, just a 20-minute stroll away. Return to your sophisticated urban retreat, where behind the lavish heritage facade a world of pop design and designer-dreamt high fashion awaits.

title: Award-Winning Singapore Resort Luxury with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Free-Flow Drinks
description:
It's easy to see why this resort was awarded Tripadvisor's 'Best of the Best' badge in 2023 (placing it in the top 1% of hotels worldwide) - the five-star retreat is perhaps the city's best place to relax, indulge and discover Singapore's countless sights. And when you book with Luxury Escapes, you'll be treated to daily breakfast and two hours of nightly free-flow wine and beer. Framed by the sweeping emerald greens of Laguna National Golf Resort Club, this shining jewel is exemplary of Singapore's reputation as the 'Garden City'. 

Energise yourself with a friendly match on the tennis courts, perfect your swing at the driving range or relax with a premium spa treatment at Devarana Wellness. Take a global tastebud tour of multi-ethnic cuisine at the forest-themed Greenhouse restaurant, or unwind with a smooth scotch and light bites at Legends Bar. With a complimentary shuttle to the airport (just 10 minutes away) and selected MRT stations, the sights of Singapore are within easy reach. Shop 'til you drop at the city's glittering malls, head to the beach for a day of surf and sun or stay in and spend the day simply floating contentedly in the swimming pool.

title: Designer City Break in the Heart of Singapore
description: Uncover the rich history and modern flair of Singapore staying in the heart of the action at the designer influenced SO Sofitel Singapore. Enjoy all the benefits of this stylish hotel, centrally located in the cultural hub of this scintillating city. Plus receive daily breakfast, your choice of daily lunches or nightly dinners and a welcome drink each for two adults.

title: Grand Opening: Singapore Glamour near Orchard Road with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Where mid-century modern design meets tropical allure, Singapore's brand-new five-star hotel is made for the most discerning travellers. Boasting one of the city's most coveted addresses just off Orchard Road, this design-driven retreat brings playful luxury to Singapore's iconic shopping strip with bold interiors and an air of exclusivity.

Backed by The Standard brand, the culinary scene here takes centre stage. Cafe Standard is the perfect place to bookend your day - starting with a coffee and finishing with an expertly crafted cocktail. Kaya at the Standard is a trendy Japanese izakaya, serving bold flavours in an ambient, jungle-inspired atmosphere.

With Orchard Road's designer boutiques and hidden speakeasies steps away, The Standard, Singapore places you right in the heart of it all. When you're not exploring the city's electric vibe, escape to the hotel’s sprawling garden pool, where sun-drenched afternoons turn into sunset cocktails and tunes from the stylish poolside bar.

title: Five-Star Singapore with Executive Lounge Access
description: Discover the soul of Singapore with a three night/four day weekend stay at the five-star Singapore Marriott Tang Plaza Hotel, on famous Orchard Road. Stay in a Deluxe Room with daily breakfasts, executive lounge access - including privileges such as nightly cocktails and hors d'oeuvres - and a three-course dinner at the hotel’s Pool Grill for only $999 for two adults, valued up to $2,540.

title: Grand Opening: Singapore COMO Orchard Road Luxury with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Legendary hotel brand COMO has finally landed in the Garden City. Be one of the first to discover signature elegance reimagined at COMO Metropolitan Singapore, positioned just moments from world-famous luxury shopping and dining precinct Orchard Road. There’s an extraordinary amount to see and do - shop your way through the glittering retail space Club 21, indulge with a mouthwatering coffee made by in-house robot barista Bruno or sample exquisite croissant creations at patisserie Cédric Grolet Singapore. Visit onsite COMO Shambhala to relax in the luxurious infrared sauna, rejuvenate in the Oxygen Therapy Space with hydroxy mild hyperbaric devices (a first in Singapore) or revive in the cooling ice bath.

Here, up-scale designer excellence is par for the course: Italian furniture by Giorgetti mingles freely with curated artwork and Atelier Ikebuchi’s breathtaking interior design. An included upgrade to the Emerald Room guarantees that you’ll be perfectly positioned to experience the luxury firsthand. After days spent exploring Orchard Road, Emerald Hill or the Botanic Gardens, head to the hotel’s glass-bottomed rooftop pool for an exhilarating dip 19 floors above the pavement.

title: Iconic Sofitel Stay with VIP Club Privileges
description: Experience the food, culture and electric atmosphere of Singapore with a five-star stay including VIP club privileges at the chic Sofitel Singapore City Centre, located above an MRT train station connecting guests to Singapore's many attractions. Live the high life with exclusive Club Millésime privileges including access to a chic lounge on the sixth floor, daily breakfast, all-day refreshments and a daily Apéro Chic cocktail hour, as well as an included 20% discount on the hotel’s amazing dining options.

It's easy to see why Dusit Thani Laguna Singapore was awarded a Tripadvisor's 'Best of the Best' badge in 2023 (placing it in the top 1% of hotels worldwide) - the five-star resort is perhaps the city's best place to relax, indulge and discover its countless sights. title: Grand Opening: Singapore Pan Pacific Opulence on Orchard Road with Club Lounge Access & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Be one of the first to discover Pan Pacific Orchard, a sanctuary filled with lush flora across four uniquely designed layers on Singapore's iconic Orchard Road. Brought to life by esteemed designers WOHA, the sustainability-focused foliage-filled innovation has already claimed World Travel Awards Asia's Leading New Hotel 2023 less than a year after its official unveiling. When the sun is shining, take to the glittering emerald pool on the unique Beach Terrace, where the coast meets the sky and palm groves seemingly float above the busy pavement. Plus, revel in the hybrid indoor-outdoor lounge spaces and mirrored ceilings.

Explore Orchard Road's renowned high-end shopping, eating and drinking district on your doorstep, or stroll to Singapore Botanic Gardens, a UNESCO World Heritage Site that provides a leafy refuge from the cosmopolitan atmosphere. Back at the hotel, visit Florette, a trendy bar where bubbles and caviar bumps unite against a smouldering backdrop, or discover the wow factor at Mosella, where farm-to-table fare is served in a gilded setting. Indulge in all the spoils of Pan Pacific Orchard - from impeccable modern design to its elite location and sparkling views of Singapore - as you relax in the Pacific Club Lounge, enjoying all-day refreshments and creative cocktails.

title: Five-Star Regent Singapore Luxury with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Free-Flow Drinks, Club Access & Kids Stay Free
description:
Experience refined luxury at Singapore's five-star Regent Hotel, ranked within Singapore's top three hotels and among Tripadvisor’s top 1% of properties worldwide in the Best of the Best 2022 awards. Regent Singapore is built around a sun-filled atrium that ascends through the building’s 12-storey interior, housing a world of culinary wonders including the hotel's award-winning Basilico Restaurant,  Summer Palace - a Michelin-starred restaurant - and award-winning, first in-hotel rickhouse Manhattan Bar, recognised in The World’s 50 Best Bars 2021 awards. Retreat to the luxurious Regent Club Lounge where guests are treated like true VIPs. If you prefer some light movement during your city escape, work up a sweat in the state-of-the-art 24 hours fitness centre, plunge into the glistening swimming pool or take it easy and indulge with a well-deserved spa treatment.

If you can tear yourself away from the opulence and sophisticated style of this luxury hotel, you'll be perfectly placed to unearth the many wonders of Singapore from a privileged position just 800m from the start of Orchard Road - one of the most exciting shopping districts in Singapore. You'll also be within easy reach of the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Singapore Botanic Gardens and a myriad of exquisite restaurants and bars.

title: Five-Star Singapore Designer Oasis with Rooftop Infinity Pool & Daily Breakfast
description:
Hidden within a 10-story glass tower, the designer Naumi Hotel Singapore invites you to delve into the glitz and glamour of Singapore from a privileged position on Seah Street. Minutes from City Hall, Bugis and Esplanade MRT - ideal for getting to Marina Bay and Haji Lane - Raffles City Singapore and the very best of the glittering city is at your doorstep.

Enter a sleek and sophisticated hideaway amid the city's bright lights from this designer launchpad, part of the acclaimed Small Luxury Hotels of the World collection and winner of a
Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice, Best of the Best 2021 award. The outside sets the tone for your stay with a four-story graffiti mural, while the Cloud 9 Infinity Pool & Bar will take it to new heights with breathtaking skyscraper views. Retreat within to discover the hotel's unique art collection and installations, before teasing the tastebuds with tantalising cuisine at the Table Restaurant & Bar.

Once you step beyond the hotel doors, the city’s charms become apparent. Gaze at the opulent, heritage-listed buildings nearby, including City Hall, the National Museum of Singapore and National Gallery Singapore. Explore Haji Lane's all-hours enclave of cool boutiques, bars, cafés, and restaurants, catch a show or performance at the nearby Esplanade outdoor theatre, have a drink 57 levels above the city at Marina Bay Sands Singapore or simply roam without an agenda and let the city inspire you.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Set up for a day of fun in Singapore with daily breakfast
- Celebrate with a special one-time romantic bed setup with chocolates
- Toast your escape with a welcome bottle of wine on arrival
- Arrive ready for your escape with a guaranteed 11am early check-in
- Enjoy a well-deserved sleep-in with a guaranteed 8pm late checkout

**Tripadvisor** **Travellers’ Choice,** **Best of the Best** **2021** Top 25 Hotels - Singapore
