title: Fairmont Opulence in the Heart of Singapore with Sky-High VIP Gold Lounge Access
description: Do Singapore in style with a VIP stopover at the recently renovated Fairmont Singapore including exclusive access to the brand-new Fairmont Gold Lounge. Enjoy a perfect city location within the Raffles City Shopping complex, above City Hall MRT Station - the best way to get around Singapore - and within walking distance of iconic attractions such as Clarke Quay, Gardens by the Bay and Chinatown. Following a multimillion-dollar renovation, the hotel offers unparalleled levels of luxury and incredible city views from the Fairmont Gold Lounge, where you can enjoy all-day snacks and non-alcoholic beverages plus nightly free-flow alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages between 5.30pm and 7.30pm. Also includes daily breakfast, served either in the Lounge, Prego or poolside at Alligator Pear, and one seafood buffet for two at Asian Market Café. Travel freely with no weekday surcharges, plus up to two children (aged 11 years and under) stay free in existing bedding with breakfast and Fairmont Gold Lounge access.

title: Luxurious InterContinental Singapore Suites near Marina Bay with Daily Breakfast & Club Lounge Access
description:
Discover new heights of award-winning all-suite luxury in one of Singapore's top hotels, with access to the exclusive Club InterContinental and many of the city’s best sights - including Marina Bay and the Central Business District - at your fingertips. Seamlessly blending heritage, Peranakan architecture and contemporary flare, InterContinental Singapore exudes opulence and charm. 

After days spent exploring the city’s best, bask in the sun with a drink in hand at the rooftop InterContinental Palms Champagne and Pool Bar or head to the prestigious The Club InterContinental Lounge to savour daily afternoon tea, cocktails and canapes. A world-class roster of gourmet delights - from contemporary Cantonese flavours to bistronomic Italian cuisine and fine charcuterie - makes dining an unforgettable experience.

With a coveted location in the arts and cultural districts of Bugis and Bras Basah, you are perfectly positioned to explore the trendy boutiques, bustling markets and vibrant culinary scene of the area. Bugis is even home to one of Singapore's most popular streets, Haji Lane, teeming with colourful, heritage shophouses transformed into trendy boutiques, cafes and bars. 

With the city's most bucket-list-worthy attractions like Marina Bay and Gardens by the Bay's Supergrove Trees mere minutes away, you can explore to your heart's content. Immerse yourself in Singapore's history with the hotel's Heritage Trail tour, or opt for the Sunset Cruise or Immersive Dining Experience for a truly unique adventure.

title: The World's Best Singapore Holiday
description: Experience an extravagant Singapore holiday with four nights at the fabulous five-star W Singapore - Sentosa Cove, located on the waterfront of Sentosa Island (Singapore's State of Fun). Lounge by the enormous WET(R) pool, indulge in daily buffet breakfast and a buffet dinner at the kitchen table, and sip on nightly cocktails at the famous WOOBAR. PLUS three nights in the heart of the city at The St. Regis Singapore. Live the luxurious life with its legendary butler service - with daily buffet breakfast, a three-course dinner at LaBrezza, nightly cocktails at Astor Bar and more for just $1,499 per person (twin share), valued up to $7,750 for two people. Watch the video below!
location_description: W Singapore - Sentosa Cove & The St. Regis Singapore [201896] The World's Best Singapore Holiday

title: Singapore Riverside Sophistication within Robertson Quay with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Cocktails & Gourmet Two-Course Dinner
description:
Centred around one of Singapore's most trending hubs, an elegant retreat awaits at this heritage Robertson Quay gem. Savour the flavours of Singapore at Entrepôt restaurant, or try a bespoke boozy concoction in the warmth of Chandu; a charming speakeasy bar with a unique market-to-glass approach.

Between city-slicking adventures, float your cares away in the hotel's spacious pool before diving into a tasty snack and the perfect gin and tonic served at the alfresco poolside bar. Re-energise with a session in the hotel's fully equipped gym, or with a book on a comfortable sun lounger overlooking the glimmering pool.

Take a stroll through the waterfront neighbourhood of Robertson Quay, where the foreshore is dotted with acclaimed dining and rich culture. Venture further upstream to the nearby Clarke Quay to satisfy your high-end cravings, while immersing yourself in the city's renowned nightlife and trendy bar scene.
location_description: The Robertson House by The Crest Collection

vendor_name: Pullman Singapore Orchard (Previously Grand Park Orchard)
title: Five-Star Luxury on Orchard Road with Club Lounge Access & Nightly Free-Flow Drinks
description:
After a decade on the doorstep of Singapore’s famed retail mecca, Orchard Road, Grand Park Orchard continues to deliver a luxury experience like no other. Previously awarded Asia’s Leading Design Hotel, this stunning five-star property stands out with its stylish herringbone facade.

Experience a city stay with designer sophistication as you indulge in daily Crystal Club Lounge access with daily breakfast, afternoon tea, complimentary all-day refreshments and free-flow evening cocktails and canapés, plus one three-course dining experience at the multi-award-winning Mitzo Restaurant & Bar, and a 2pm late checkout, subject to availability.

title: Singapore Top 5 Hotel: Award-Winning Heritage Luxury with Daily Breakfast & Spa Credit
description:
Discover unparalleled grandeur at this centrally located Singapore retreat, a five-star property that blends the charm and character of a heritage building with all the modern conveniences of a luxury hotel.

Ideally situated for exploring Singapore's iconic attractions, including Marina Bay Sands, Merlion Park and the National Museum of Singapore, this exclusive haven also offers easy access to the city's vibrant dining and shopping scenes.

Relax and unwind in the hotel's saltwater pool, or stay active in the state-of-the-art fitness centre. Savour delectable dishes from the coal grill at the acclaimed 15 Stamford Restaurant, enjoy a wide selection of rum and cocktails at The Bar at 15 Stamford or treat yourself to a luxurious Sunday brunch or an elegant afternoon tea at the Lobby Lounge.

title: Elegant City Escape with VIP Club Lounge Access
description:
Ideally located in the beating heart of Singapore, the five-star Grand Park City Hall places you close to iconic sites including Raffles City, Capitol Piazza, Marina Bay and Suntec City. Time seems to stand still as you enter via the historic bronze gateway - and only resumes when you step out into the city’s effervescent streets, teeming with restaurants, shopping and nightlife.

Discover the best of Singapore while staying in elegance at one of Condé Nast Traveler’s ‘24 Best Hotels in Singapore’ for 2019. Your package includes daily Crystal Club Access - with daily buffet breakfast, all-day non-alcoholic refreshments, nightly cocktails, complimentary Wi-Fi and laundry service - a one-time three-course set-menu dining experience at Tablescape restaurant, serving European classics, and a guaranteed 2pm late checkout. 

⏱**Buy now, book later**: Secure this deal now and choose your travel dates when you're ready (see Fine Print for details).

title: Five-Star Kempinski Luxury with Elite Lounge Access
description: Run by the iconic German Kempinski Hotels group, one of the world’s oldest and most prestigious brands, The Capitol Kempinski Hotel Singapore places guests in the heart of Singapore's cultural district and near top attractions such as the Marina Bay area, Singapore CBD and Chinatown. Perfect for a stopover or a luxe city break, your escape includes exclusive lounge access, an incredible daily bottomless breakfast with free-flow Prosecco, a second option of daily buffet breakfast with free-flow prosecco at 15 Stamford, a three-course dinner for two, late 3pm checkout and a discount at the spa.

title: Luxury Grand Hyatt Singapore Escape with Club Lounge Perks & Free-Flow Drinks
description:
Hidden in the heart of Singapore’s glitzy shopping belt at the start of the iconic Orchard Road, Grand Hyatt Singapore delivers five-star glamour within a stone’s throw of the ION Orchard and Paragon shopping malls, Orchard MRT and Singapore Botanic Gardens. Part of the world-renowned Hyatt brand, this hotel offers boutique luxury with five onsite dining outlets, an award-winning spa and an exclusive Grand Club Lounge experience. Enjoy daily all-you-can-eat continental breakfast served right to your table with Grand Club Lounge perks throughout your stay, including nightly canapés and free-flow alcoholic drinks.

**Travelling with family?** One child (aged 12 years and under) stays free with daily breakfast. Or upgrade to the Grand Deluxe Two Bedroom for two adults and three children.

title: Grand Reopening: Five-Star Singapore CBD Heritage Glam with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Free-Flow Drink Hour
description:
Discover old-world opulence in the Lion City with a five-star heritage stay at Hotel Telegraph Singapore, formerly the city's iconic SO/ Sofitel. Born out of the city’s historic telecommunications building, this hotel features bespoke rooms, each showcasing soaring neo-classical architecture, breathtaking Parisian flourishes and faultless service. Savour morning coffee and midnight cocktails at Lobby Bar, reimagined Singaporean plates at The Dining Room or head to 1927 Rooftop Bar for signature drinks backed by panoramic views over the city’s spellbinding skyline.

When you’re ready to explore, Hotel Telegraph Singapore offers the perfect base. Head to nearby Lau Pa Sat market, a landmark institution blending urban history, colonial architecture and mouthwatering eats, shop your way through Orchard Road or say hello to the iconic Gardens by the Bay, just a 20-minute stroll away. Return to your sophisticated urban retreat, where behind the lavish heritage facade a world of pop design and designer-dreamt high fashion await.

title: Contemporary Singapore City Oasis with Daily Breakfast, Club Lounge Access & Rooftop Cocktails
description:
Some escapes are truly momentous: set within beloved heritage district Queenstown and with a spectacular rooftop infinity pool and bar that offer an unrivalled sunset setting, Momentus Hotel Alexandra delivers a Singapore stay that’s worth boasting about.

After days spent feasting at hawker centres, shopping on Orchard Road or exploring the region’s heritage trails, return to canapes and cocktails at the exclusive Momentum Club or sundowners at Verandah Pool Bar & Grill, with views over the city’s lush gardens, Southern Ridges jungle and the shimmering Singapore Strait beyond.

While offering a quieter slice of Singapore to explore, the hotel’s complimentary shuttle bus service places you within an easy 10-minute journey to inner-city Outram, shopping and dining district HarbourFront and Sentosa Island’s warm beaches and fun-filled amusement parks. Families will especially love Momentus Hotel Alexandra's Connecting Room, with two adults and two children included.

title: First Time Ever: Singapore Ultimate Marina Bay Luxury with Daily Breakfast & Club Access w. All-Day Champagne (select rooms)
description:
Step into a world of timeless opulence in the heart of the Lion City with an extraordinary stay right on the glamorous Marina Bay. Following an extensive $150 million, six-month renovation, Mandarin Oriental unveils world-class facilities and beautifully revamped rooms, creating a luxurious haven with stunning views of the iconic bay.

For the first time ever you can experience it all for yourself with Luxury Escapes. Let go of your cares at the holistic day spa, indulge at any of seven top-tier dining venues and make the most of the all-day free-flow champagne with your included Club Access (select rooms). When it's time to cool off, the sparkling rooftop swimming pool awaits or simply lounge poolside in a luxe cabana with a cocktail in hand. After all that indulgence, retreat to your stylish room with Marina Bay views.

It's no wonder Mandarin Oriental has been awarded Forbes Travel Guide five-star award in the hotel and spa category for the past 10 consecutive years, as well as being featured on the recent season of _Luxury Escapes: The World's Best Holidays_ and the cover of Dream by Luxury Escapes magazine. 

When you’re ready to explore, Mandarin Oriental Singapore offers the perfect base. Head to nearby Lau Pa Sat market - a landmark institution blending urban history, colonial architecture and mouthwatering eats - shop your way through Orchard Road or say hello to the iconic Gardens by the Bay, just a 20-minute stroll away.

title: Award-Winning Singapore Orchard Road Glamour with Three-Course Dinner, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Located in the heart of Orchard and boasting over a century of heritage, this resplendent hotel is where Singapore’s culinary artistry, stately architecture and European history converge. Built in 1900, the renowned establishment has welcomed distinguished guests, including the former Prince of Wales, the Duke of Windsor and Russian ballerina Anna Pavlova.

Walking through the hotel’s storied grounds you will find two glistening pools - one being the first hotel pool in Singapore - and seven award-winning restaurants and bars. Unwind with aperitifs at Highland Bar, savour Cantonese and Sichuan cuisine at Min Jiang and take a seat at Gordon Grill, a continental fine diner that has hosted several Michelin-alum guest chefs.

Ready to explore? Just a short drive away, discover the lush Botanic Gardens or the city's famed Gardens by the Bay, and indulge in the ultimate retail therapy on the renowned Orchard Road, home to upscale shopping malls and delectable dining spots, just steps away.

title: Five-Star Kempinski Luxury with Elite Lounge Access
description: Run by the iconic German Kempinski Hotels group, one of the world’s oldest and most prestigious brands, The Capitol Kempinski Hotel Singapore places guests in the heart of Singapore's cultural district and near top attractions such as the Marina Bay area, Singapore CBD and Chinatown. Perfect for a stopover or a luxe city break, your escape includes exclusive lounge access, an incredible daily bottomless breakfast with free-flow Prosecco, a second option of daily buffet breakfast with free-flow prosecco at 15 Stamford, a three-course dinner for two, late 3pm checkout and a discount at the spa.

title: BEST OF 2019: Glamorous SO/ Sofitel City Escape with Nightly Free-Flow Drinks
description: Experience 19th-century French flourishes with designer finishes in the heart of Singapore’s bustling business district at the SO/ Sofitel Singapore. Kitted out with Parisian-inspired interiors, this award-winning heritage retreat feels like a world away from the future-forward skyscrapers outside. Embrace old-world glamour with three nights in a So Cosy Room with signature touches by Karl Lagerfeld, daily buffet breakfast, nightly selected free-flow drinks with a chef's selection of canapés, a two-course set menu dining experience at the Xperience Restaurant and a 15% food and drink discount per room to use at any onsite restaurant, including the ritzy 1927 rooftop bar.

title: Award-Winning Singapore Luxury Golf Retreat with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Free-Flow Drinks
description:
Occupying an enviable location within minutes of Singapore Changi Airport, this resort is the perfect place to indulge and discover the sights of the city. Framed by sweeping emerald golf greens, this shining jewel exemplifies Singapore's reputation as the 'Garden City'. Energise yourself with a friendly match on the tennis courts, perfect your swing at the driving range, or relax with a premium spa treatment at Devarana Wellness.

Take a global tastebud tour at the forest-themed restaurant Greenhouse, or unwind with a smooth scotch and light bites at the Legends Bar. With a complimentary shuttle to the airport and select MRT stations, the sights of Singapore are within easy reach. Shop 'til you drop at the city's glittering malls, head to the beach for a day of surf and sun, or stay in and spend the day simply floating contentedly in the swimming pool.

title: Back & Better Than Ever: Best-Selling, Award-Winning Elegance Overlooking Marina Bay
description: Stay in a prime location near Marina Bay at Conrad Centennial Singapore, a newly-refurbished, luxury oasis in the city. You’ll enjoy access to the exclusive Executive Lounge, where daily buffet breakfast with sparkling wine, afternoon tea, nightly cocktails and hors d’oeuvres and all-day wine, beer and drinks are served with a side of breathtaking Singapore city views. Plus, enjoy your choice of either a five-course feast at the highly-acclaimed Golden Peony or a luxury seafood buffet at Oscar’s, and a 20% discount on additional dining and drinks at the hotel.

title: Swissotel The Stamford Singapore - Dining Decadence
description: Immerse yourself in Singapore’s vibrant charm, staying at one of the city’s most desirable addresses - overlooking Marina Bay with easy access to famous shops and restaurants. Spend three nights at Swissotel The Stamford Singapore and enjoy daily buffet breakfasts, a decadent four-course or buffet dining experience, a daily drink each, complimentary cover charge to the iconic Bar Rouge and 25% dining discount at most onsite restaurants for two.

title: A Weekend Stopover in Singapore's Clarke Quay
description: Discover the soul of Singapore with a four day/three night weekend stopover in the heart of the city at the riverside Park Hotel Clarke Quay. Ideally located in the city's iconic Clarke Quay shopping, dining and entertainment precinct, with easy access to popular attractions like Marina Bay, Singapore Zoo, the Night Safari and Sentosa Island. Enjoy daily breakfasts, a three-course dining experience, a bottle of wine and more for only $699 for two adults, valued up to $1,409.
location_description: Park Hotel Clarke Quay [198145] A Weekend Stopover in Singapore's Clarke Quay*

title: Singapore Glamour: Orchard Road Elegance with Daily Breakfast & Two-Hour Nightly Free-Flow Drinks
description:
Discover signature elegance reimagined at this prestigious retreat, positioned just moments from the world-famous luxury shopping and dining precinct, Orchard Road. This exclusive city hideaway is the culmination of the very best in accommodation, dining, wellness and fashion, housed across 19 spectacular floors.

Visit onsite COMO Shambhala to relax in the luxurious infrared sauna, rejuvenate in the Oxygen Therapy Space with hydroxy mild hyperbaric devices (a first in Singapore) or revive in the cooling ice bath. Indulge in mouthwatering Korean barbecue at Michelin-starred COTE Singapore Steakhouse and be sure to try an exquisite pastry creation at Cedric Grolet Singapore.

Here, up-scale designer excellence is par for the course: Italian furniture by Giorgetti mingles freely with curated artwork and Atelier Ikebuchi’s breathtaking interior design. After days spent exploring Orchard Road, Emerald Hill or the Botanic Gardens, head to the hotel’s glass-bottomed rooftop pool for an exhilarating dip or shop your way through the glittering retail space Club 21.

title: Award-Winning Singapore Luxury Suites with SG$150 Dining Credit, Daily Breakfast & Club Lounge Access
description:
Discover new heights of award-winning, all-suite luxury in one of Singapore's top hotels. Located in a heritage district brimming with cultural attractions, you'll be nearby the lively Arab Street and Haji Lane, as well as the National Gallery Singapore.

After days spent exploring the city’s best, your grand colonial-style suite beckons. Bask in the sun by the hotel’s sparkling pool, savour Chinese fine dining at the Michelin-recommended Man Fu Yuan or retreat to the prestigious Club InterContinental Lounge to indulge in daily afternoon tea, cocktails and canapés.

Boasting a coveted location near Bugis and Bras Basah, you are perfectly positioned to explore the trendy boutiques, bustling markets and vibrant culinary scene of the area. With the city's most bucket-list-worthy attractions like ION Orchard and Gardens by the Bay's Supergrove Trees nearby, you can explore to your heart's content.

title: Award-Winning Stay in the Heart of Singapore's Shopping District
description: Step into a vibrant urban paradise just a short walk from the iconic Orchard Road and premier shopping with a stay at the multi-award-winning Mercure Singapore On Stevens. Just 18-months old, your lush city break will let you unwind comfortably with a welcome drink each, daily buffet breakfast, a buffet dinner and a 20% food and beverage discount per room to use throughout your stay.

title: Marina Bay Sands Singapore Glamour with Rooftop Infinity Pool
description:
Encompassing three separate towers, 55 storeys and a prime stretch of real estate on Marina Bay, this iconic Singapore sojourn epitomises luxury on a grand scale. Extravagance is evident everywhere, from its 23-storey-high light-filled atrium to the iconic 150-metre-long infinity pool, 57 floors above the city. Earning the prestigious Forbes Travel Guide five-star rating, this hotel is the epitome of luxury. 

Upscale retail boutiques are located opposite the hotel, with high-flying brands from Chanel to Giorgio Armani at your fingertips. When it comes to dining, you're spoilt for choice - rooftop views and signature dishes await at Lavo, along with the finest selection of steaks from three continents at Cut.

Wake at sunrise for sound meditation on the tranquil Sands SkyPark or dance the night away at the the largest club in Singapore - Marquee Nightclub, complete with a full-sized ferris wheel and three-storey spiral slide. Discover moments to live at this hotel, whether you're looking for action, adventure or romance.

title: Elegant Singapore City Oasis with Glittering Rooftop Pool & Blissful Day Spa
description: Experience refined luxury at Singapore's PARKROYAL on Beach Road - an award-winning escape located in the city's elegant Bugis district. Explore the city at your doorstep before indulging in pampering at St. Gregory for a heavenly treatment, or plunging into the huge pool with views of the city skyline. When wining and dining, take your pick from five onsite venues, including Si Chuan Dou Hua Restaurant for exquisite Suchuan cuisine, and Tian Fu Tea Room for Chinese tea and dim sum.

vendor_name: Holiday Inn Express Singapore Orchard Road
title: Singapore Orchard Road Escape with Award-Winning Green Initiatives
description: For a Singapore stay that's clean, green and comfortable, head for the Holiday Inn Express Singapore Orchard Road, boasting a stellar central location in Singapore's shopping mecca. This award-winning hotel prides itself on its clean energy initiatives, without forgoing premium facilities like a Grab & Go breakfast bar and a 24-hour fitness studio. Just a short walk away is Somerset and Orchard MRT Stations, placing Marina Bay, Gardens by the Bay and Universal Studios within easy reach.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Singapore Orchard Road, an IHG Hotel

title: Grand Opening: Tranquil Singapore Rainforest Hideaway with Two Restaurants & Rooftop Infinity Pool
description:
Experience the wild beauty of Singapore’s lush Mandai Wildlife Reserve at this eco-luxury sanctuary, where nature and comfort exist in perfect harmony. Wake to the sounds of the rainforest and explore world-famous neighbours, including the Singapore Zoo, Night Safari and River Wonders, all mere steps away from this sustainability-first haven.

Spend your days wandering forest trails, encountering rare wildlife and reconnecting with nature before retreating to your signature room inspired by its surroundings. When hunger strikes, relish farm-to-table delicacies at Forage and enjoy all-day dining at Planter's Shed, all complemented by serene rainforest views. Later, embrace restorative spa treatments infused with botanicals at the Banyan Tree Spa.
location_description: Mandai Rainforest Resort by Banyan Tree

vendor_name: Pan Pacific Serviced Suites Beach Road
title: Five-Star Singapore Pan Pacific Opulence in Heart of the CBD with Rooftop Swimming Pool
description: Discover the glitz and glamour of Singapore's buzzing streets from the opulent Pan Pacific Serviced Suites Beach Road, a five-star oasis offering unparalleled hospitality. Spring into the dazzling CBD and spend balmy nights discovering the city's hottest attractions, all a short stroll away. Retire to your urban sanctuary at the end of each day to recharge in total comfort, or make a splash in the glimmering rooftop pool and toast to your stay with a signature Nasi Lema'rgarita at Club 5 bar.
location_description: Pan Pacific Serviced Suites Beach Road, Singapore

title: Five-Star Singapore Garden Oasis in Chinatown with Infinity Pool
description: Reach a state of relaxation in a garden oasis in the heart of Singapore with a stay at the five-star PARKROYAL COLLECTION Pickering. Known as Singapore's first hotel-in-a-garden, this architectural marvel features four garden terraces guaranteed to leave you amazed. Laze by the hotel's shimmering infinity pool, head to award-winning St. Gregory Spa for a rejuvenating treatment or embark on a diverse culinary experience at vibrant, open-kitchen-concept Lime Restaurant.

title: Singapore Relaxed Luxury with Grab & Go Breakfast Hub
description: Explore the silver skyscrapers and green spaces of the Lion City when you stay at the Holiday Inn Express Singapore Katong, an IHG Hotel. Keen shoppers will delight in the hotel's location next to the seven-story i12 Katong shopping mall, while Singapore's major tourist sights including the iconic Gardens by the Bay and Singapore Flyer are just a 15-minute drive away. During your downtime, enjoy a meal in the hotel's Great Bar dining area.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Singapore Katong, an IHG Hotel

vendor_name: The Outpost Hotel Sentosa by Far East Hospitality
title: Stylish Singapore Escape with Iconic Rooftop Bar & Day Club
description: Situated in the heart of the adventurous Sentosa Island, overlooking the shining blues of Singapore Strait, The Outpost Hotel Sentosa by Far East Hospitality couldn't be better located to experience the very best of the sophisticated city,  with easy access to highlights such as Universal Studios and the historic Fort Siloso. The hotel offers an extraordinary abundance of culinary delights - savour Parisian classics at Le Faubourg, sip your way across countless international drops at Straits Wine Company or snack on light bites by the rooftop infinity pool of 1-Altitude Coast.
location_description: The Outpost Hotel Sentosa by Far East Hospitality
offer_address: 10 Artillery Avenue #03-01 Palawan Ridge, Sentosa Island, Singapore 099951

title: Singapore Luxury Garden-Inspired Hotel with Wellness Centre & Six Restaurants
description: The glamour of Singapore's Marina Bay is yours to discover from PARKROYAL COLLECTION Marina Bay, Singapore, an eco-conscious, high-end escape in the heart of the city. If you're seeking pampering, there's an entire floor dedicated to wellness: enjoy signature treatments and revitalising therapies at St. Gregory spa, or join a spin class in the studio. Meanwhile, the outdoor 25-metre pool is illuminated by 1,380 fiber-optic lights at night, so you can swim through a galaxy under the stars.

title: Singapore Tranquil Self-Contained Apartments in Iconic Fashion District
description:
Experience the vibrant energy of Singapore with a stay at these self-contained apartments, perfectly positioned in the heart of the city's bustling shopping district. Just a short stroll from the hotel, you'll find the famous Orchard Road, lined with high-end boutiques, local eateries and vibrant nightlife. After days spent exploring, return to the comfort of your stylish studio or apartment, each thoughtfully designed with expansive living areas and fully equipped kitchens. 

Take a dip in the hotel's shimmering pool, or keep up with your fitness routine at the gym. When it's time to explore further, the hotel's prime location offers easy access to the nearby Singapore Botanic Gardens, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, and the National Museum of Singapore, showcasing the city's rich history and culture

title: Five-Star Singapore Riverside Escape with World-Class Onsite Steakhouse
description: Singapore's riverfront is a sophisticated medley of high-end restaurants, cafes and shopping, and the five-star InterContinental Singapore Robertson Quay, an IHG Hotel, is the cherry on top. Listed as Singapore's Leading Lifestyle Hotel at the World Travel Awards in 2022, this hotel boasts a superior location along the Singapore River, with the CBD just a five-minute drive away. When you're not exploring the local sights, stay in and be spoilt for choice with excellent onsite dining venues.
location_description: InterContinental Singapore Robertson Quay, an IHG Hotel

title: Singapore Historic Escape with Rooftop Infinity Pool Only 15 Minutes from Changi
description: Discover the soul of old Singapore with a stay at Hotel Indigo Singapore Katong, an IHG Hotel, just a 15-minute drive from Changi International Airport. Housed within a preserved police station in the heart of Singapore’s original and trendiest heritage district, live life like a local - wander Katong’s art-filled, antique streets, enjoy modern Singaporean plates and artisanal coffee at Baba Chews, or head to the rooftop infinity pool for magnificent sunset views of the neighbourhood below.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Singapore Katong, an IHG Hotel

title: Five-Star Singapore Sofitel Stay with Onsite Restaurant & Outdoor Infinity Pool
description:
Experience the vibrancy of Singapore's bustling Tanjong Pagar district with a stay at a five-star oasis, where French art de vivre meets Asian sophistication. This urban retreat is a stone's throw from the city's most iconic attractions, including the historic Chinatown and the lush Gardens by the Bay.

Savour gastronomic delights at Racines, where French and local cuisines converge, or sip on artisanal cocktails at 1864, the hotel's sophisticated lounge. Venture to the 30-metre infinity pool for a refreshing dip, or maintain your fitness regime at the state-of-the-art gym.

title: Five-Star Elegant Singapore Escape in Heart of Orchard Road
description: Explore Singapore’s bustling Orchard Road like a local with a stay at the inner-city sanctuary of Pan Pacific Serviced Suites Orchard. Spring into the dazzling shopping precinct of Orchard Road and spend balmy nights discovering world-class dining aplenty, all a short stroll away. Cool off by taking a dip in the shimmering outdoor pool for a serene moment or head to Bedrock Bar and Grill for an unforgettable gastronomical feast offering a festival of flavour from across the world.
location_description: Pan Pacific Serviced Suites Orchard, Singapore

title: Iconic Raffles Singapore Opulence with Historic Bars & Dining Venues
description:
As the world's first Raffles destination and one of the most iconic hotels in the world, this Singapore landmark sets the standard for five-star luxury. Experience a monumental stay with world-class facilities and regal design, backed by legendary and impeccable hospitality.

Savour exquisite dining at the hotel's renowned Tiffin Room, serving authentic North Indian cuisine, or indulge in a signature Singapore Sling at its birthplace at the Long Bar. Sit where legendary authors have clinked cocktails at the Writers Bar and indulge in sumptuous wellness therapies at the spa.

title: Five-Star Singapore Stay on Orchard Road Boutique Shopping District
description: Enjoy a restful slumber at voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel after a shopping spree at the boutiques of Singapore's famous Orchard Road. Savour indulgent treats at the onsite restaurants and cafes, take a refreshing dip in the rooftop pool or rest and relax in the comfort of a sophisticated suite or guest room. For those looking to work up a sweat, hit the 24-hour fitness centre or shop 'til you drop at the many upscale boutiques and department stores along Singapore's famed shopping strip.
location_description: voco Orchard Singapore, an IHG Hotel

title: Five-Star Mandarin Oriental Luxury in Singapore's Marina Bay with Forbes Award-Winning Spa
description: Immerse yourself in the beauty of Singapore at the ultra-luxurious, five-star Mandarin Oriental Singapore, located on the glamorous Marina Bay. The hotel's world-class facilities have seen it awarded the Forbes Travel Guide five-star award in the hotel and spa category for the last 10 consecutive years. Experience them for yourself: let go of your cares at the holistic day spa, indulge at any of seven top-tier dining venues, and maintain your routine at the fully equipped fitness centre. When it's time to cool off, the sparkling rooftop swimming pool awaits, or simply lounge poolside in a luxe cabana with a cocktail in hand. If you can tear yourself away from paradise, you'll find yourself surrounded by Singapore's famed sites, including Marina Bay Sands, Merlion Park and the National Museum of Singapore.

title: Contemporary Grand Mercure Singapore Retreat within Heritage Katong with Tranquil Pool & Three Restaurants
description:
Step into the heart of Singapore’s vibrant Katong district at this contemporary retreat, the perfect home base with the best of the city right at your doorstep. With the colourful Peranakan houses mere steps away and easy access to the MRT railway, you’re perfectly positioned to explore iconic sights and local treasures while staying in absolute comfort.

Kick-start your day with coffee and fresh pastries at Roxy Divine, before enjoying a dip in the sparkling outdoor pool. After a day of urban adventure, return to the hotel where a contemporary buffet awaits at Feast Asia restaurant or tuck into authentic Chinese cuisine at Jia Wei Chinese Restaurant, before enjoying a nightcap at poolside Breez Bar.
offer_address: 50 East Coast Road, Roxy Square, Singapore 428769, Singapore

title: Five-Star Singapore CBD Apartment-Style Stay with Infinity Pool & Restaurant
description: Between historic hawker centres, spectacular skylines and supertrees stands the modern, five-star Dao by Dorsett AMTD Singapore, offering guests an apartment-style stay in the heart of the city’s vibrant central business district. After days spent shopping on Orchard Road or witnessing the wondrous Gardens by the Bay, return to a top-notch fitness centre and relax by the hotel's serene, seventh-floor infinity pool, seemingly disappearing into the skyline beyond. Two sumptuous dining and drinking venues await at Dao by Dorsett AMTD Singapore - savour international plates with Singaporean flair at Collective or sip handcrafted cocktails beneath avant-garde chandeliers in the hotel’s Grand Lobby. Positioned just moments from MRT Tanjong Pagar Station and the city's many delights, each spacious, contemporary apartment boasts everything you need to discover Singapore's very best.
offer_address: 6 Shenton Way, OUE Downtown 1, 07-01 Singapore 068809, Singapore

title: Five-Star Kempinski Luxury in the Heart of Singapore with Saltwater Relaxation Pool
description: Experience unrivalled luxury at The Capitol Kempinski Hotel Singapore, a five-star property that exudes the timeless heritage charm of a luxurious colonial building while offering guests every modern convenience. This cosmopolitan retreat is perfectly positioned to explore Singapore's famed sites, including Gardens by the Bay, Merlion Park and the National Gallery of Singapore. Spend your days eating, drinking, shopping and exploring before returning to your elegant accommodation. Head to the hotel's saltwater relaxation pool to soak away your stress or work up a sweat in the onsite fitness centre. Pop over to the mouthwatering 15 Stamford Restaurant to bring your palate to new heights as you savour the freshest land and sea produce, meticulously prepared by their talented culinary team for delicious international cuisine.

title: Singapore Urban Luxury with Panoramic Views & Michelin-Starred Restaurant
description: Step into a world of modern comfort and opulence with a stay at one of the tallest hotels in Southeast Asia. Take in scenic views of Singapore’s cityscape from your balcony before indulging in the hotel's extensive collection of restaurants and bars, including two Michelin-starred JAAN by Kirk Westaway. Watch the sun set with a cocktail in hand at SKAI Bar, lounge by one of two pools, or unwind with a treatment at Willow Stream Spa before exploring vibrant Singapore.

vendor_name: The Clan Hotel by Far East Hospitality
title: Sophisticated Singapore Five-Star Break on Historic Cross Street
description: Embrace Singapore's old world elegance and discover new heights of modern luxury with a five-star stay at The Clan Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality, masterfully placed among Cross Street’s historic shopfronts and marketplaces. Beginning with a welcome ritual performed by the resident tea master, the hotel’s unrivalled ambience invites you to celebrate all that has gone before. Savour hawker classics at QIN or admire the ever-changing cityscape by the hotel’s glorious Sky Pool.
location_description: The Clan Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality
offer_address: Far East Square, 10 Cross Street, Singapore 048417, Singapore

title: Chic Singapore City Stay near Little India with Rooftop Pool & Onsite Restaurant
description:
Immerse yourself in the eclectic energy of Singapore with a sophisticated stay at this Mercure sanctuary, perfectly situated in the trendy Jalan Besar district, popular for its vibrant mix of hipster cafes, stylish boutiques and traditional hawker centres. Soak up the charms of Singapore from the floor-to-ceiling windows of the well-appointed rooms, take a refreshing dip in the hotel's rooftop pool and cool off with a drink from the bar.

Explore the nearby cultural heritage sites of Little India and Chinatown while the iconic Mustafa Centre and the world-class shopping precinct of Orchard Road are also within easy reach. Return to your hotel and indulge in a gastronomic experience with creatively prepared dishes and Western delicacies at Applause on Tyrwhitt Bistro & Bar.

title: Singapore Little India Escape with Award-Winning Green Initiatives
description: Take a deep dive into Little India, Singapore's most culturally vibrant district, when you stay at Holiday Inn Express Singapore Serangoon. This award-winning green hotel prides itself on its clean energy initiatives, without forgoing premium facilities like a Grab & Go breakfast bar, laundry facilities and a 24-hour fitness studio. What's more, you're within close proximity to some of the city's best destinations including Orchard Road, Chinatown and Marina Bay.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Singapore Serangoon, an IHG Hotel

title: Opulent QT Singapore Metropolitan Escape near Clarke Quay with Rooftop Pool & Onsite Dining
description:
Welcome to QT Singapore, a place where opulence is dialled to the max and eccentric artwork meets modern facilities, wrapped up with a touch of skyline charm. Head to Cygnet by Sean Connolly for signature plates and classic cocktails, or settle into the rooftop pool that will melt your stress faster than the Singapore heat.

Tucked away in a restored heritage building in the heart of the Lion City, QT Singapore puts you moments away from Orchard Road's shopper's paradise. If you want to balance your city adventures with some moments of zen, the Botanic Gardens make for an ideal escape, or if you're craving a late-night food crawl through Chinatown, it's all within easy reach.

title: Lush Singapore Retreat Near Gardens by the Bay with Infinity Pool & Gourmet Dining
description:
Step into an urban oasis minutes from Singapore's retail heart Orchard Road and the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Singapore Botanic Gardens. Inspired by the city's iconic colonial black-and-white houses, the stylish rooms blend heritage charm with modern luxury. Unwind at the 24-hour gym, take a dip in the infinity or lap pool or test your skills on the tennis court. Savour global cuisine at Winestone Restaurant and enjoy room service at your leisure.

For food enthusiasts, the hotel is ideally located near a wide range of dining options, from bustling hawker centres to world-class restaurants. Explore iconic landmarks like Marina Bay Sands and Gardens by the Bay for a truly unforgettable Singapore experience.

title: Lavish Singapore Escape near Orchard Road with Rooftop Infinity Pool
description:
Explore Singapore’s bustling Orchard Road like a local with a stay at the inner-city sanctuary of Artyzen Singapore. Spring into the dazzling shopping haven and spend balmy nights discovering world-class dining aplenty, all a short stroll away.

Cool off by taking a dip in the shimmering rooftop pool for a serene moment or head to Quenino by Victor Liong for an unforgettable gastronomical feast helmed by acclaimed Hatted Chef Victor Liong from Melbourne, in collaboration with one of Singapore’s top female chefs, Sujatha Asokan, as Chef de Cuisine.

title: Singapore Riverside Sophistication in Robertson Quay with Outdoor Pool & Speakeasy Bar
description:
Centred around one of Singapore's most trending hubs, an elegant retreat awaits at this colonial-inspired Robertson Quay gem. Savour Anglo-Asian cuisine at the elegant Entrepôt restaurant, or try a bespoke boozy concoction in the warmth of Chandu; a charming speakeasy bar with a unique market-to-glass approach.

Between city-slicking adventures, float your cares away in the hotel's spacious pool before diving into a tasty snack and the perfect gin and tonic served at the alfresco poolside bar. Take a stroll through the waterfront neighbourhood of Robertson Quay, dotted with acclaimed dining and rich culture, or venture further upstream to the nearby Clarke Quay to satisfy your high-end cravings.
location_description: The Robertson House by The Crest Collection

title: Mondrian Singapore Escape in Duxton Hill with Infinity Pool, Three Restaurants & Hollywood-Themed Rooftop Club
description:
Fall in love with the allure of the Lion City with a sophisticated stay at this eye-catching Mondrian abode, perfectly positioned among the traditional shophouses, cocktail bars and pedestrian-only laneways of ultra-trendy Duxton Hill. Thrill yourself with gastronomic experiences at Bottega Di Carna, relish wood-fired flavours at Christina's, sip on sultry cocktails at the Jungle Ballroom and soak up epic skyline vistas from the 1970s Hollywood-themed rooftop pool zone, Canyon Club.

The hotel's prime location near Chinatown puts you in the perfect place to explore the cultural, historical and culinary gems of the city. Venture out to the nearby Maxwell Food Centre for a taste of local street food, explore Duxton Hill's trendy boutiques and visit the iconic reserve of Gardens by the Bay.

title: Relaxed Central Singapore City Break with Outdoor Swimming Pool & Award-Winning Chinese Restaurant
description: From enchanting gardens to boutique shopping and delicious street food, Singapore is a treasure trove of discoveries, best explored from Holiday Inn Singapore Atrium, an IHG Hotel. When you're not exploring this vibrant metropolis from your central launchpad, be sure to savour the finest Cantonese delicacies at the award-winning Xin Cuisine restaurant, take a dip in the glorious outdoor swimming pool and keep up your daily workout routine at the modern fitness centre.
location_description: Holiday Inn Singapore Atrium, an IHG Hotel

title: Central Stay in Singapore's Vibrant & Colourful Little India District
description: Enjoy a stylish stay at the Holiday Inn Singapore Little India, an IHG Hotel, in the heart of the city's colourful Little India district, full of heritage shop fronts and quaint eateries. Soak up authentic Thai street food and endless panaromic city views at the onsite restaurant, Blue Jasmine, ponder your trip over a coffee and superfood bowl at Soul Brew, or cool down with a dip in the sparkling outdoor pool. Located atop Farrer Park MRT station, this hotel connects you to the best Singapore has to offer.
offer_address: 10 Farrer Park Station Road, Singapore 217564, Singapore

title: Elegant Singapore French-Inspired Luxury on Sentosa Island with Pool, Three Restaurants & Jazz Bar
description:
Perched on a cliff overlooking the shimmering waters of the South China Sea, this five-star Sofitel sanctuary boasts a coveted spot on the southern edge of Singapore's ever-vibrant Sentosa Island. Sprawled out over 27 acres, this resort offers direct access to the Tanjong Beach and brings French sophistication at every turn - from luxurious suites and rooms to glittering seafront pools.

Savour gastronomic delights at Kwee Zeen, which serves Pan-Asian, Western, and Indian cuisine, while The Cliff, an alfresco restaurant, specialises in Italian fare. For indulgent high teas, find yourself at LeBar and unwind in style at Maduro, the resort's onsite whisky and jazz bar. When you wish to explore, the bustle of downtown is a short drive away.

vendor_name: Holiday Inn Express & Suites Singapore Novena, an IHG Hotel
title: Modern Singapore Stay in Novena with Outdoor Pool
description: Discover Singapore’s vivid Balestier District at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Singapore Novena, an IHG Hotel. Find yourself surrounded by colonial villas, upscale shopping, lively eateries and stunning temples. At your hotel, the sun-kissed pool beckons, and a Grab & Go breakfast awaits to fuel you on your journey. Further afield, take a wander to cultural attractions such as the Thian Hock Keng Temple and the lush Zhongshan Park.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express & Suites Singapore Novena, an IHG Hotel

title: Singapore COMO Luxury Moments from Orchard Road with Onsite Gourmet Dining & Expansive Wellness Studio
description:
Experience the best of Singapore's spoils at this luxury retreat just moments from the world-famous Orchard Road shopping and dining precinct. Satisfy your palate onsite at COTE Singapore, a Korean steakhouse by Michelin-alum chef Simon Kim, sip cocktails at the Sky Bar and savour flaky pastries from Cédric Grolet's first patisserie in Asia.

Start your day with a coffee made by the in-house robot barista, Bruno, and then head to the expansive COMO Shambhala spa offering a range of rejuvenating and holistic treatments.

title: Five-Star Central Singapore Stay in Marina Bay with Eight Restaurants & Bars
description: Have the best of Singapore at your doorstep at Pan Pacific Singapore, a five-star sanctuary located inside Marina Square just a stone's throw away from iconic landmarks like Gardens by the Bay. Savour a world of flavours at the hotel's gourmet Edge restaurant, one of six eateries, or sip on bespoke cocktails at the Atrium. And with so much to explore, retreat to the award-winning St. Gregory Spa for soothing treatments to get you back on your feet.
offer_address: 7 Raffles Boulevard, Marina Square, Singapore 039595, Singapore

vendor_name: Paradox Singapore Merchant Court at Clarke Quay
title: Tranquil Singapore Riverside Escape Near Clarke Quay with Three Restaurants, Free-Form Pool & Serene Spa
description:
Experience the perfect blend of heritage and modern luxury at this resort-style retreat in Clarke Quay. Ideally located for discovering all that Singapore has to offer, this sophisticated escape pairs old-world charm with contemporary comfort.

Enjoy authentic Peranakan fare and international dishes at the riverside café,  savour Western favourites beside the free-form outdoor pool, or sip on handcrafted cocktails at the Crossroads Bar, paired with scenic views. Rejuvenate at Aramsa Spa, where natural, botanical treatments restore balance and calm. Later, venture out to explore the Garden City's top attractions - all within easy reach of the hotel.

vendor_name: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre
title: Stylish Singapore Stay Near Orchard Road w. Rooftop Pool
description: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre, an IHG Hotel is the ultimate launchpad to experience the refined elegance of Singapore's glittering Orchard Road. Invigorate body and mind at the fitness centre or with a refreshing dip in the rooftop pool, before venturing out into the famed shopping district and beyond. Return from your adventures and sate your appetite at the hotel's sumptuous Tandoor restaurant - a renowned Indian restaurant serving fragrant fare.
location_description: Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre, an IHG Hotel

title: Opulent Five-Star Regent Singapore Stay with Michelin-Star Restaurant
description: Experience the height of opulence with a five-star stay at Regent Singapore, perfectly located just a short walk from the start of Orchard Road, the city's world-famous retail boulevard. Discover a world of culinary wonders across exceptional venues, including sophisticated, Michelin-starred Cantonese plates at Summer Palace, sumptuous cocktail brunches at Manhattan - named #33 in The World’s 50 Best Bars 2022 awards - or authentic, intimate omakase sushi at Taiga Dining.

title: Sophisticated Central Singapore Stay Near Marina Bay with Michelin-Star Restaurant & Onsite Spa
description: Relish opulent city living at this sophisticated downtown stay, located only a short stroll from the historic Clarke Quay and Marina Bay. Dine in style at the hotel's Michelin-starred JAAN by Kirk Westaway, savour Italian plates at Prego, or indulge in the flavours of Japan at Mikuni - with three more exceptional bars and eateries to choose from. For moments of rest, rejuvenate with Eastern spa traditions and holistic treatments at the tranquil Willow Stream Spa.

vendor_name: Pullman Singapore Orchard (Previously Grand Park Orchard)
title: Glamorous Singapore Stay on Orchard Road with Gourmet Restaurant & Chic Beach Club
description:
Delve into a world of designer fashion and sophistication with a stay at this luxurious Pullman sanctuary, nestled in the heart of Singapore's iconic Orchard Road. Discover the vibrancy of the city's premier shopping and entertainment district with a vast array of boutiques, restaurants, bars and dazzling malls right at your doorstep, waiting to be explored.

Spend your days making memories at the Instagram-friendly P.S.O. Beach Club, serving up artisanal cocktails at the swim-up bar and hosting retro pool parties that capture the spirit of tropical fun in the middle of the city. Swim laps in the outdoor pool or embark on a culinary journey at the stunning glasshouse restaurant, Eden where you can sample modern Asian delicacies.

title: Trendy Singapore Pullman Stay Moments from Fort Canning Park with Pool & Onsite Dining
description: Be at the forefront of Singapore’s energetic offerings with a stay at this renowned Pullman location. Perfectly positioned in the city's bustling arts and heritage district, the hotel lands you within walking distance of Fort Canning Park, the famous Orchard Road and Marina Bay precinct. Delight in culinary experiences, from craft cocktails at Moga, to rooftop Mexican at El Chido and New York dishes at Madison’s, before taking time out for a refreshing dip in the sun-dappled pool.

title: Heritage-Inspired Chic Singapore Stay with Panoramic City Views, Onsite Dining & Infinity Pool
description:
Resting in the heart of Singapore’s arts and cultural district, Bugis-Bras Basah, this contemporary and colourful oasis is designed for a trendy stay. Stunning heritage-inspired rooms and steps from historical landmarks, eclectic shopping malls and trendy eateries, this is your gateway to the best of Singapore.

Unwind in style with a stunning infinity pool overlooking the city and a breathtaking sky deck with panoramic Singapore views. Food lovers will rejoice with international and local cuisine at Royale Restaurant, award-winning Chinese at Song Garden and refreshing cocktails at Bartistry@One22.

title: Opulent Singapore Pan Pacific Escape Above Prime Shopping Street
description: Discover Pan Pacific Orchard, a verdant sanctuary on the iconic Orchard Road that integrates nature across four tropical levels. Visit Florette bar, where bubbles and caviar unite against a smouldering backdrop. Get the wow-factor at Mosella restaurant, serving farm-to-table fare in a gilded setting. Or take to the sand-edged pool on the Beach Terrace and find where the coast meets the sky.

title: Cosmopolitan Singapore Hideaway Near Orchard Road Shopping District
description: Experience the sophisticated elegance and refined luxury of the bustling Orchard Road with a stay at the cosmopolitan Vibe Hotel Singapore Orchard. Offering superb access to the famed shopping district, shop 'til you drop before retreating to this elegant hotel that oozes modern luxury. Savour indulgent treats at the Australian-themed ROOS restaurant, and bookend your day at the Lobby Bar, serving barita-made coffee by day and cocktails by night.

vendor_name: Holiday Inn Express Singapore Clarke Quay
title: Sophisticated Inner-City Singapore Stay with Rooftop Pool & Garden
description: Spend a night in the clouds and take in a breath of fresh air at the Holiday Inn Express Singapore Clarke Quay, an IHG Hotel. Enjoy panoramic views of Singapore's magnetic cityscape from the spectacular rooftop pool, deck and garden and squeeze in a workout at the hotel’s fitness centre. Venture into the sprawling city below and explore an abundance of cuisines from across Asia in Chinatown’s Food Street or make your way across the harbour to Universal Studios.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Singapore Clarke Quay, an IHG Hotel

title: Singapore City Break near Farrer Park with Outdoor Pool
description: Take a few short steps to the bustling Serangoon Road and treat your senses to the sights, sounds and smells of Singapore with a city escape to PARKROYAL on Kitchener Road, Singapore. Explore the 24-hour shopping paradise of Mustafa Centre or take a short walk to the Farrer Park region and be enthralled by the neighbourhood's vibrant colours. Upon your return, take an invigorating splash in the hotel’s outdoor pool or relish in a tantalising selection of Asian eats at Spice Brasserie restaurant.

title: Contemporary Mount Faber Retreat near Sentosa Island with Rooftop Pool & Restaurant
description:
Revel in the tranquillity of Mount Faber at this contemporary parkside retreat. Awaken to breathtaking views of Singapore's oldest park through floor-to-ceiling windows, before savouring the day at the rooftop pool, gazing over the tropical landscape and across to Sentosa Island.

Delight your palate with a fusion of flavours at The White Tiffin Fusion restaurant, serving seasonal fare with a twist. Venture beyond the hotel to explore VivoCity, Singapore's largest shopping mall, or embark on a day trip to action-packed Sentosa Island, home to Universal Studios Singapore, world-class golf courses and the renowned S.E.A. Aquarium.
location_description: Hotel Faber Park Singapore - Handwritten Collection

title: Stylish Singapore Changi Airport Stay with Glittering Outdoor Pool
description: Where convenience and luxury meet, a stay at Crowne Plaza Changi Airport, an IHG Hotel, guarantees you're perfectly placed for city exploration or connecting flights. Discover the Jewel, a tropical wonderland where nature meets retail, just next to the hotel or explore downtown Singapore, just a 25-minute MRT ride away. Relax by the outdoor pool, work up a sweat in the fitness centre or follow the call of fine dining to Azur, where light bites and sumptuous meals await.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Changi Airport, an IHG Hotel

title: Singapore Novotel Sophistication Near Orchard Road with Infinity Pool & Onsite Restaurant
description:
Experience the sophisticated elegance and refined luxury of the bustling Orchard Road with a stay at the cosmopolitan Novotel Singapore On Stevens. Sink into sleek rooms that feel like your own stylish sanctuary. Decompress in the rejuvenating spa treatment or float away in the glittering infinity pool.

Offering superb access to the famed shopping district, shop 'til you drop before retreating to this elegant hotel. Savour indulgent treats at the Food Exchange buffet, and end your day at the L'Apéritif Lobby Bar, serving French-inspired cocktails and European and Asian tapas.

title: Five-Star Flagship Escape to One of Singapore's Best Hotels
description: Discover flagship luxury at the five-star InterContinental Singapore, set in the heart of the Bugis and Bras Basah cultural districts. A magnificent blend of rich Chinese heritage, Peranakan architecture and modern amenities, the resort excludes opulence and charm. An offering of gourmet delights draws on the city's diverse influences, from toothsome contemporary Cantonese to an Italian bistronomic restaurant and a thematic traditional afternoon tea. Linked to the Bugis MRT station, the wonders of Singapore, including the famed Orchard Road shopping district, are within easy reach. Explore nearby attractions such as the Marina Bay area, Singapore CBD and Chinatown, before returning for an indulgent spa treatment or champagne at the pool bar.

title: Singapore Serviced Suite Stay with Tranquil Day Spa
description: Singapore's effortlessly cool city centre beats with intrigue and culture and is yours to explore when you stay at PARKROYAL Serviced Suites Singapore. Celebrate the royal heritage of Kampong Glam and the bustle of Suntec City, where traditions and culture meet modern living. Don't miss a chance to be pampered at St. Gregory, for heavenly treatments like Ayurveda therapy, hot stone massages and facials using top-of-the-line Elemis products. When wining and dining, four onsite venues offer up everything from Sichuan cuisine to Chinese tea, Singaporean dishes with a twist and craft cocktails.
